title: Tested: OtterBox’s magnetic power bank is ultra-versatile with MagSafe charging passthrough
content:
A bit late to the game, OtterBox just launched its first MagSafe-compatible Power Bank. Waiting for other manufactures to show their hands first, the new release arrives with a first of its kind feature set centered around its passthrough MagSafe charging. But was it worth the wait? Our latest Tested with 9to5Toys review explores what to expect.

more…

The post Tested: OtterBox’s magnetic power bank is ultra-versatile with MagSafe charging passthrough appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: OtterBox MagSafe Power Bank may not be the first on the market, but its unique MagSafe charging passthrough shines among other features.
